fa_list <- function(x, incremental = FALSE) {
  icons <- names(x)
  fragment <- ifelse(incremental, "fragment", "")
  items <- glue::glue('<li class="{fragment}"><span class="fa-li"><i class="{icons}"></i></span> {x}</li>')
  paste('<ul class="fa-ul">', 
        paste(items, collapse = "\n"),
        "</ul>", sep = "\n")
}
